testcase.name: runScenario["Attempt login with valid credentials", "Optional[Web Login]"](1)
testcase.system-out: =========================================================== Scenario name::Attempt login with valid credentials Scenario tags::[@critical, @regression, @smoke, @functional] ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The user is on login page Entered valid credentials Clicked on submit Yeah I am logged in ===========================================================

testcase.name: runScenario["Attempt Login with invalid credentials", "Optional[Web Login]"](2)
testcase.system-out: =========================================================== Scenario name::Attempt Login with invalid credentials Scenario tags::[@critical, @functional, @regression] ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The user is on login page Entered invalid credentials Clicked on submit error displayed::: Username or password invalid User was not logged in ===========================================================

testcase.name: runScenario["Check for company logo on login form", "Optional[Web Login]"](3)
testcase.system-out: =========================================================== Scenario name::Check for company logo on login form Scenario tags::[@critical, @ui, @regression] ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The user is on login page The company logo is present in the login form ===========================================================
